title: Great place to relax and have drinks
text: Great place for cocktails and drinks. The staff are great and all seem to love their jobs. They will make cocktails off the menu and the Long Island Ice Tea was the best I have had in a long time. Highly recommend a visit if you are only in town for one night, like I was.

title: Acropolis
text: A must see in Athens. Only 10€ from 1st Nov (winter prices). Take food and drink as not much availability to buy and plenty of great places to have lunch. Did also like the Cats....

title: Great Cafe
text: Great cafe for stop off on a long road trip. Nice rolls and veggie friendly as well. Highly recommend.

title: Great vegetarian place
text:
Great little place for vegetarian food. No fuss, good value and a nice experience. Good location near some nice bars.

Was not busy when went, but a good atmosphere.

title: Great friendly food
text:
Great place to stop off for a drink and some pasta or pizza.

Great views and great service.

I bit hard to find, up stairs in the small shopping complex.

title: Relax
text: A very nice way to spend an hour or two. Great coffee, great service and free Internet. Highly recommend.
